scripts.apm:publish:major: aragon apm publish major --files app/build/ --prepublish-script apm:prepublish
scripts.apm:publish:minor: aragon apm publish minor --files app/build/ --prepublish-script apm:prepublish
scripts.apm:publish:patch: aragon apm publish patch --files app/build/ --prepublish-script apm:prepublish
scripts.publish:kit:rpc: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile --all && aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/ deploy.js
scripts.publish:kit:staging: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:staging | tail -n 1) --environment staging

scripts.publish:kit:mainnet: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
